title: 求一个能pingBC子服人数的插件
author: a1823120827

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
安装papihttps://www.spigotmc.org/resources/placeholderapi.6245/
输入指令/papi ecloud download Bungee
/papi reload
变量
%bungee_total%  总在线人数
%bungee_<子服名称>%  某个子服在线人数

bossshop变量就那几个，用tab列表显示也可以的。
插件地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-635723-1-1.html

replies.author: a1823120827
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 新版BossShop支持papi，安装对应的papi即可
